biz.acceleration.graylog.plugins.alarmcallback.jira

Class JiraWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • biz.acceleration.graylog.plugins.alarmcallback.jira.JiraWrapper

  • public class JiraWrapper
extends Object
    Author:
    jason Need to define these in the configuration of the plugin: credentials (username and password), issue type - the JIRA issue type to create assignee - the JIRA user to assign the issue to summary - the summary to set for the issues created
